name: Fighting Game Prototype 0.0
description:
[Controls]

Player 1

  • Directional Controls: Arrow Keys
  • Light Attack: Comma
  • Heavy Attack: Period

Player 2

  • Directional Controls: W/A/S/D
  • Light Attack: G
  • Heavy Attack: H

Game is still a VERY early WIP! Damage values and frame data are still being developed, but a lot of the basic systems are in place. Not sure how much work I will put into this, but still wanted to share as part of the Finally Finish Something game jam (although I guess it isn't technically finished yet).
